component.name: TridUI
component.summary: Identify file types using TrID definitions

description.p: TridUI is a lightweight desktop application that provides a user-friendly interface for TrID, a powerful tool for scanning and analyzing files. With TridUI, users can easily select or drop files on the Home screen to initiate local scans, making it convenient to detect unrecognized file types.
The application uses a native Go implementation of the TrID file identification algorithm, providing fast and accurate file type detection without external dependencies.

ul.li: Accurate file type identification using TrID definitions
100% local processing - no data leaves your computer
Detailed match results with confidence scores

screenshot.caption: Main interface with drag-and-drop file scanning
